title: Remove List Elements from the End (Challenge)
description: In this challenge, you will write a function that removes a specified number of elements from the end of a list in Python.

meta.title: Python List Manipulation | Remove Elements from the End
meta.description: Learn how to remove elements from the end of a Python list using the take_right() function. Improve your programming skills with this Python tutorial.
